Posts.EditableText:
Hey.
Been messing around with some stuff, and want to make some nice pictures - but I need some opinions.
I shall also get some at work, from my graphic designer colleague, but I do like more than one opinion - and over the net you can be brutal without having to suffer any consequences.

Anything bad you can pick at, do so.
I want some critisism here!

[url=http://compwhizz.mine.nu/1.jpg:1ys64jjx]pic1[/url:1ys64jjx]
[url=http://compwhizz.mine.nu/2.jpg:1ys64jjx]pic2[/url:1ys64jjx]

Pics should be up for the next 24 hours at least, as long as there's no power cuts, or anything wrong with my wireless connection.
